name: Together Alone (okrob_studios)
description:
A short game created for the 48 hour GMTK2021 Game Jam! Art created by my sister and coding and editing done by yours truly. 

By sticking close together your characters can avoid the traps and get to the end portal. It's technically a single-player game but I find it as enjoyable as a local co-op as well. 

Daily Beetle by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3579-daily-beetle
